thread.title: Listeria Can Grow on Unrefrigerated Caramel Apples (ASM - American Society for Microbiology)
thread.title_full: Listeria Can Grow on Unrefrigerated Caramel Apples (ASM - American Society for Microbiology) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Listeria Can Grow on Unrefrigerated Caramel Apples (ASM - American Society for Microbiology)
text: ( Source : ASM - American Society for Microbiology ) Washington, DC - October 13 , 2015 - Caramel apples punctured with dipping sticks and left unrefrigerated over the course of a couple of weeks may harbor a bacterium called Listeria
